comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: A Mr. James H. Lee was manager of Lee Brothers Importing and Exporting Company of Shanghai, China; he was a member of the Honorary Commercial Commission of the Republic of China, making a tour of the US in June 1915. They toured Edison's Orange NJ factory in June 1915, and Western Electric in Chicago and New York, and Wsestinghouse in East Pittsburgh, and General ELectric in Schenectady. books.google.com/books?id=Z2sfAQAAMAAJ&dq=%22J.%20H.%... books.google.com/books?id=ee1YAAAAYAAJ&lpg=PA783&... books.google.com/books?id=RY0wAQAAMAAJ&lpg=PA35&o...

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Here is a group from the Chinese commission arriving for their visit with Edison on June 8, 1915 This is K.F. Shah, (Kai Fu Shah)(Xia Xiefu), China's ambassador to the U.S., who also attended some events with the Commission.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for linking this photo of a member of the trade commission with the group photo.  We'll add some of that information to the record the next time we update.
